item.title: Installing pylibmc in ubuntu
item.description: Before you install Pylibmc on your machine, there are a few dependencies that you need to take care of, so as to ensure a successful installation. Install python-dev 1 sudo apt-get install python-dev Install libmemcached 1 sudo apt-get install libmemcached-dev Now you can successfully install pylibmc using pip 1 sudo pip install pylibmc
